name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chill Super Mario Pixel Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relax with a retro twist as Super Mario brings chill vibes to your Chrome tab in this pixel-perfect live wallpaper! 🎮🌈🍄

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get nostalgic with Super Mario in a laid-back pixel art style! This live wallpaper showcases Mario in a relaxed, chilled-out scene straight from a classic pixel world. Perfect for fans of retro gaming and Mario enthusiasts, this wallpaper combines 8-bit charm with functional tools to make your browsing experience both nostalgic and convenient.

Key Features
🖼️ Live Pixel Wallpaper: Enjoy a calming pixel art background with Super Mario in a relaxed setting.
🔗 Customizable Site Shortcuts: Access your favorite sites quickly with editable shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Convenient search bar styled to fit Mario’s pixel aesthetic.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: A retro-themed clock and date to keep you on time with Mario’s chill vibes.
🔗 Quick Access Links: “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” links located in the lower left corner for easy management.
Add a touch of retro gaming relaxation to every new tab. With nostalgic visuals and essential browsing tools, this extension is a must-have for Mario fans looking for a peaceful vibe.
